Document.Title: MS SQL Server 7.x: Tables sysxlogins and sysservers

Content: The SQL 7 Tables sysxlogins and sysservers can be opened to remove users and/or servers that you do not want to appear in dialogs in the Enterprise Manager. By opening the SQL Server Properties > Server Settings dialog in the Enterprise Manager you can make sure that you can modify these tables by checking "Allow modifications to be made directly to the system catalogs".
